name: Assault
display_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are partially resistant to Taunt and Placate.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

name: Granite_Armor
display_help: When you activate this power, you are transformed into a massive bulk of unyielding Granite. Your incredible mass makes you almost completely invulnerable and resistant to most effects. However, you also become quite heavy, cannot fly, your attack and movement speed are Slowed and you do less damage. Granite Armor also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs.Cannot be active at the same time as other Armors in this set, Fly powers, Sprint, Super Speed, or Jump powers. Recharge: Slow
display_attacker_hit: Your Granite Armor has made you practically invulnerable!

name: Earths_Embrace
display_help: You are so connected to the Earth, you can draw upon its power to add to your own health. Activating this power increases your maximum Hit Points, and grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

name: Mud_Pots
display_help: While this power is active, you draw upon the geothermal power of the Earth to create a bubbling pool of hot mud around yourself. All foes in melee range will become snared and entrapped in the mud, Immobilizing some and slowing others. The boiling heat from Mud Pots also deals some damage over time to the snared foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize, -SPD
display_target_help: The Mud Pots are burning you and reducing your Running speed. You may be immobilized, as well.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

name: Quicksand
display_help: Your Running speed, Jump height and Defense are reduced by the Quicksand.

name: Stone_Prison
display_help: Immobilizes a single target within an earthy formation and deals some Smashing damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Stone Prison can also reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: You are being crushed by a Stone Prison. You are immobile and cannot fly. Your Defenses are reduced.

display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
